value:
I know it's pointless to think about
what might have happened in Brodia
since I left. Still, I do worry.

My country, Brodia, is known as the
Kingdom of Might. But I'd rather
make alliances than start wars.

If it is a soldier you need, you can
call upon me. I have not let up on my
training here, if that's your worry.

That weapon of yours shoots
spheres, hm? Aim it at me, then.
I'd like to see if I can deflect them.

One of my retainers writes novels,
and the other is known for his many
delightful, ah...let's call them feats.$k$pThinking about those two, I can't help
but smile.

You'll have to forgive me for
dropping in on you. I was asked by
$Nf to bring this.

A fitting achievement for the crown
prince of Brodia.
I'm always striving to be better.

That's all right. I fight well enough
with the strength I have.

Send me into battle, and I'll show that
I'm worthy of this gift.

I am Diamant, crown prince of Brodia,
and your new ally. I vow to protect
this land as if it were my own.

Is something wrong? Did you find
a spider on your pant leg or
something?$k$p...I see. Well, I'm glad it wasn't a
spider. The way you ran around last
time that happened! Ahaha!$k$p*ahem* Sorry... When I start laughing,
it's difficult to stop. And you have a
way of making me drop my guard.$k$pI suppose that speaks to true
friendship, doesn't it? Putting each
other totally at ease.$k$pWhen I'm around you, I forget the
pressures of my life... I stop worrying
if I have the strength to lead.$k$pI need that sense of peace if I'm going
to achieve victory. So, I can only hope
our bond lasts for a long time yet.
No less than victory!
Watch over me, Father...
For the pride of Brodia!
I'll prove my worth!
Defeated...
If you're trying to gauge me for weakness...try harder.
*startle* You caught me with my guard down. Seems I still have a lot to learn.
I am very curious about that weapon of yours. Perhaps you'll spar with me sometime.
Emblem Roy's ring was entrusted to the kingdom of Brodia, my homeland.
This armor is exceptional for deflecting blades. For magic...less so.
Father... Wherever my path takes me, I swear to make Brodia proud.
I don't mind chatting, but if it's an interesting conversation you want, you should seek out my retainers.
Without question.
Tell me where.
I won't lose.
